page.description: Used by web security to verify if SQL tables are used by security and if they are valid and can be accessed.

argument.name: Project
argument.description: The name of the project to verify security. E.g. "Default". If no project is specified, the security information for the current project is loaded.

discussion.p: The *[xb:a5ws_VerifySQLDataConfig()]* function opens the *[ui:Web Security SQL Data]* dialog. The dialog is used to verify security tables in a SQL database are valid and can be accessed.

see.ref: Utilties for the Web Security System
